Vehicle.Name: TL-18b Medium Transport
Vehicle.Description: [H3]TL-18b Medium Transport[h3] A reconfigured version of the Suwantek Systems TL-1800 light freighter, the transport variant can convey a small party great distances in relative comfort and security. The initial run of TL-1800s flew with an error-prone navicomputer, but by the time Suwantek began to produce the purpose-built transport variant, this had been replaced with a powerful navigational and sensor suite, most probably overcompensating for the reputation earned by the earlier production run. [P]The blunt wedge shape of the TL-series hull has been augmented in the 18b with an expanded living area along the dorsal spine just aft of the broad viewports of the cockpit/navigational deck. A broad bank of dual Y-v-6 sublight drives contributes to the small transport's perceived similarity to the Corellian Engineering CR90 corvette. [P]Utilizing superior computing and sensor arrays, the TL-18b has become a favorite for those seeking an alternative to high-cost command and control ships for security or paramilitary purposes. Many large corporations, system governments, and regional combines use TL-18b transports rather than the more expensive diplomatic courier ships employed by the Empire and other powerful organizations.
Vehicle.Crew: One pilot, one co-pilot, one liaison officer
